channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Huge decline at LA port is a hit to truckers—and a stark warning of coming tariff damage
item.description: Los Angeles is already experiencing a huge drop-off, and truckers in other cities will soon be hit too.

item.title: How Trump’s promise of ‘Drill, baby, drill’ faded to ‘Delay, baby, delay’ for oil companies
item.description: The oil producers and services firms are cutting budgets and production is in decline mode.

item.title: German economy gets yet another downgrade as government projects zero growth this year
item.description: "Tariffs and trade policy turbulence are hitting the German economy harder than other nations".

item.title: The truth about the dollar’s decline: ‘You’ll either have to raise prices, or lower profits’
item.description: Also: Trump insists he is talking to China, Apple will move iPhone production to India.

item.title: Trump can’t follow through on plans to cut public school funding over DEI programs, judge rules
item.description: District Court Judge Landya McCafferty said it wasn't clear what the Education Department believes a DEI program is or when it believes such programs ...

item.title: Apple wants to move production of U.S.-made iPhones from China to India: report
S&P 500 and Nasdaq set to lead gains on Friday as Alphabet surges after earnings
Here’s how much money the 2025 NFL draft picks will make tonight
